mapper.select: -- 根据userid查询对应的权限，需要角色和权限的状态都是正常的 SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0
